Excellent choice.

Not enough credits . . . Not Credits credits . . .

You want to own me? Bring more CREDITS!!!
Keep dreaming big honey. Maybe one day!
Congratulations on your new purchase (playername).
Thank you for buying (machine). That's me!
(playername), you are now my new master.

You need a vending machine license to do that.
All yours (playername).
So many Credits! What are you gonna buy with that?
Ah, that felt great! Remember to put more food in me.
We will make a lot of Credits together . . . Hehehe.
Remember, I take edible items only!
Hey . . . hey! Give that back!
Please. I don't want to do this anymore. Free me . . .
What is it like (playername)? Being alive that is.
Take the Credits, but no funny business . . .
Remember to bring more food. More is better!
Your bag is already full.

101_URIEL
Nice to see you again, (playername). Still getting adjusted to life in White Ash Harbor?_It's a slower pace than Billboard City, but you'll get used to it.
I wish you had seen this town in its prime. What a sight it was and it didn't reek of fish! Blegh!
Have you ever tried dry aged meat? The flavor is out of this world.
I wonder where I would've been if . . . Sorry! You caught me talking to myself! Hope your day is a solid one.
Most people prefer the sun, but I like myself a cool rainy day. It really calms me.
A good sense of direction will get you home in no time. It's a skill to develop, sure, but once you have it you'll never feel lost again.

Can I tell you something? I've been living my dreams for the last fifteen years and this butcher shop is it. Not many people can say that._Passion and dreams are what's needed in life. What are your dreams for Le Sequoia?
I have a lot of plans in my head. We'll see what works!
I don't know just yet, this is all new to me.
As does any owner of an establishment, but planning without action won't keep the lights on._You have to work for it. I mean, reeeallly work for it!
Understandable, but if Chef Casteau gave it to you, he must have seen something to trust.
I promise my meat is sourced ethically. At some point it had a name, breathed air, and saw sky._You should always eat something that had a name. It's how you know people cared for it.
I make sure I get the best meat for my customers. Getting cheaper meat to sell isn't the point of this shop._We're here to provide the best because my customers are the best.
Standards matter in this business. If people see you are doing things to a high degree, they come out and support you.
I will never take advantage of people's trust._Trust is the most valuable currency and should never be spent or taken lightly.
When I was a boy, I used to go exploring in the woods when I wasn't on my grandfather's fishing boat._Used to hear all sorts of odd things out there. Whispers in the trees and such. Pretty creepy.
You ever notice it's the small things in life that really make the day? Like, getting the knife in the joint and popping it is just so satisifying._Do you get that feeling from butchering meat?
. . . what?
. . . yes, I get this feeling.
Well, it's simply a joy to feel, to me that is.
Right?! It's such a satisfying sound. Hearing it reminds me that my time spent learning this trade has paid off.

Have you talked to Bowie yet? He's my grandfather! He has some amazing stories to tell. I learned about a curing technique that they use overseas from him._Only have six more months of waiting to see if it worked.
When I get a chance to chat, I take it, because this place is my second home._Only instead of couches there's slabs of meat. Almost like home.
When it's raining, I like to zone out for a moment._Rain always makes me forget about my world for just a moment, but then I snap back to the meat in my hands and the knife cutting into it.
What's a break? Haha! When you own your business there are no breaks on this train, am I right? Haha . . . ha.

I never understood why La Galarie is in French. The furniture's nice, sure, but why is everything that's fancy seen as French?_The French also eat cooked snails. Is that fancy? Yes, because it's French! See, propoganda can get anyone.
Hey (playername), ever feel like you're being pulled in a bunch of directions?_That you are burned out even though things are going well?
There are days, yeah. Work is hard.
No, I know what I am doing and where I am heading.

Yeah, like Hasel is an android who always gives it her all and never feels worn out. She's chipper and makes amazing drinks._I try to stay positive, but there are days when that isn't the case, and they feel like they're happening more often.
Must be nice to feel that way. This shop is a success, and I enjoy the work, but I often wonder if I should try something else for a bit? Maybe be a painter?

Pomarine gave birth to 12 kids, raised them, and fed them even after her husband left her and the children._How she was able to adapt to such adversity is beyond me, but it led to her being the best hunter in White Ash Harbor.
Part of me, even now, feels like I am waiting for all of this to fall flat._For people to see that what I am is really just a lie. I know it won't happen, but I believe it will.
Sorry for venting so much earlier. I'm okay! I . . . I just need to unwind._It's been busy. So busy . . .
I joked about how this place is my second home, but truthfully, I haven't gone home in four days._I've been that slammed and I don't know if what I'm doing is . . . anyway, don't fret, I'm good.
Maybe I should take a walk on the beach sometime . . . there's always something to look at and enjoy there.
Do you think I cut up people's bodies and sell them as prime cuts?
Uhhhh, no! Not at all?
Uriel, you know I trust you, but sometimes you say things that really sound . . . bad.
That was the least convincing 'no' I have ever heard. You want to know the truth? I don't, but I let everyone think that I do._Hasn't hurt business at all . . . which is odd.
And I trust you. I trust you enough to let you know the truth . . . I don't cut up people. I let everyone think that so I don't get pushed around. It hasn't hurt my business, which is odd.
Maybe I should name my cuts of meat? Like, 'Today we have five Susan cuts and twenty Fredrick cuts' or something? On second thought, maybe not, too many questions.

I was walking to the shop the other day and I saw someone making paper airplanes at on a bench in the forest._She was just sitting there, folding, and throwing these planes. Must have been a hundred scattered around her.

My entire family is into fish. They fish it, sell it, make recipes for it. Me? I can't stand the smell of it._Couldn't get into it, so I figured, being a butcher was the next best thing since I'd developed my knife skills on my family boat.

Getting together with my dad is fun, I enjoy him, but truth be told, we have some friction there still._He and mom haven't been completely happy about my choice to deal in land based proteins. Makes Thanksgiving awkward, you know?

I'm glad that we talk, you know. Chatting with you helps me forget some of the more dreadful things in my life_ I think a lot of people wrestle with the choices they've made. I know I have, but having a friend like you makes it bearable.
Good morning, my filet minion!_I am going to save some amazing cuts of beef for us.
Oh, you don't have to do that for me!
Mmmm, that sounds lovely.
It isn't a matter of have to, I want to. I want to treat us to the finest I can find because we deserve that.
There's a New York strip I have aging right now that will be amazing in a few weeks.
Since we've been together, I have started to see life as something that isn't my job._I have started to see the many layers that it can have and I want to see it all with you.
I hope that we go the distance because I really think what we have here is very special.
I'll probably never stop working because I enjoy what I do so much, but I will never allow my job to come between us. Never.
I'm trying to not jump ahead of anything . . . But . . ._. . . But when we're old, and it's the end of the day, I'd like to just have some tea and hold your hand while the day unwinds.
I know we're together, but I am going to lay this out for you: I don't expect you to give up your dreams for me._I hope I just get to be there to see you shine.
101_URIEL_PROGRESSION

Congradulations on your restaurant opening, (playername)!_This is the fun part, the start of it, where you see if your dreams fly or crash into a firery ball of sadness._It'll probably be the happier part! I'm sure of it, maybe.
I read Lucius' review of your food. Your food is great and everyone here agrees._I don't care if he liked it or not, critics shouldn't have that much power over people's minds!

Great job getting the bathhouse up and running again._That took some guts! I always heard it was huanted, not that I believe in ghosts because if I did then I'd be in trouble in my line of work, haha! Well done!
Well done with Le Sequoia! I've been hearing folks walking around talking about it and they are all saying how amazing it is. Keep going, you got it!
I had a few customers talk about the teahouse the other day. Makes me want a relaxing cap after a long day of cutting and preparing meat.
I've been watching you answer those bulletin board requests, and someone has to say it, but good on you helping people out.
Your work with the bulletin requests is making folks around here a lot more pleasant. You're a good person for doing it. Keep it up!
The menu at Le Sequoia is very intriguing to say the least! I haven't heard of some of these dishes, (playername), but they sound yummy.
That menu you got at Le Sequioa is very exciting. I cannot wait to try what you're making with my meat!
I dunno about your menu right now, it feels really . . . off. It needs more meat options, in my own opinion.
I don't think I'm going to eat at your restaurant right now. The menu isn't sitting well with me at the moment.
Way to keep this town clean and running, (playername)!_The quality of meat available will go down if we lose the environment it likes browsing around and eating.
Clean air and a healthy forest are key to keeping our little town happy and healthy. Thanks for making sure we're safe.
I really cannot stress how much I hate the trash floating around here._If it makes its way into the livestock, I cannot promise that the quality of the meat won't go down.
If we don't get a handle on all of this pollution soon, I will have to resort to alternate forms of protein, and trust me, you don't want that happening.
(playername), thanks for the help again with that delivery. I really need to remember it's okay to ask for help, even when it's not an emergency.
Looking at the ocean the other day was really relaxing, because it felt like I wasn't there for a moment, and it was peaceful.
. . . Oh, right. I  . . . I just don't get it somedays, you know? Why do I show up here? Why should I . . . never mind. Don't fret about it.

My passion for feeding people was why I got into this job. I lost sight of that overtime._The work was all I saw, and I didn't see myself outside of it. Thanks for reminding me that even though my work is important, I am too.

After realizing that making my life about work wasn't living, I decided to try some hobbies._I tried the usual ones like making a ship in a bottle, knitting, but they weren't doing it. I almost gave up, until I discovered . . .dance! I love it.

It's funny, I really wouldn't be where I am mentally without your help. Life doesn't need a drastic change all the time._Small things we can do for ourselves is really what's needed more often than not. For the last time, probably not, thanks.
101_URIEL_INTERACT
Uh, thanks?
My apron needs to be washed soon. There's blood on it.
I d . . . don't understand why you think that, but okay.
These skills have taken years to hone. Thanks for the compliment.
Look, I have been doing this for a few years now, I know I got it. Thanks.
Sure, that would be very helpful.
No need, I've dealt with a lot more in the past.
Hey, this is pretty awesome! Thanks!
Ah, how did you know? I feel better drinking this.
Really appreciate it (playername). This is really good for me. Too much meat and all, you know?
This looks really valuable! I don't really need this, but I appreciate the thought.
Hey, you remembered! You are a good friend (playername).
I think it's pretty neat, but I don't need it.
Thanks (playername), but I do not need this.
What's this? Do you want me to keep this?
Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
Heyyy, there we go. Now go wash your shirt, it's got blood on it.
Sorry, I'm covered in blood, a lot of blood.
Sells meats, eggs
Hello! Welcome to Chop! What can I get for you?
What can I get for you?
Welcome! What would you like to order today?
Chop, where the knives don't stop when they hit bone. What can I get you today?
Come on in! We got some amazing specials today.
Yum! That one is my favorite.
Good buy, that cut is prime!
Ah, great choice!
I haven't seen its like, I'll take it.
Look at this!
Great! I can use this.
I can't use this, but thanks anyway.
Sorry, don't need it.
I don't need this, but someone else might.
Are you sure you don't have any credits in your pockets?
Hmmmm, doesn't look like you can afford this.
You'll need some more credits, sorry!
102_ALOYS
Sup. Hope those shrimp worked out for you.
I've been around a lot of shrimp, and I gotta day, they are feisty little guys.
Fishing was guessing and hoping you're right, but now we have technology, so we can stop guessing.
Hey, if you see any old pieces of tech, let me know.
I'm gonna grab a boba from Hasel. She's always got something new going on.
(playername), how's the restaurant going?
Okay. But it could be better.
Not well. It's been stressful.
If the stresses of owning Le Sequoia ever become too much to handle, let me know, and we'll do some fishing.
Running your own ship takes a lot out of you, but I hear it's worth it. Let's do some fishing sometime to take the stress off.
Shrimp scampi, shrimp cocktail, shrimp gumbo, shrimp by itself. There are many ways to eat shrimp.
Shrimp is delicious, but don't eat it everyday, they're a sometimes food.
Just between you and me and the sea, this job is just a job for me. What I really want is to get into robotics.
If you see a guy wandering around with a peg leg, don't ask him how he got it. TLDR, it wasn't a whale.
Man, I hope one day that old bathhouse opens again. That would be nice after a day on the boat.
If you find an X-23 Servo, can you bring it to me?
Sure.
A whattada what?
Thanks, we need it for Hasel._She has certain . . . mechanical problems. Technically . . . Bianca asked me to find it . . .
I don't get a lot of time off the docks. It looks like a sausage maker for a mixer, but bigger. It's for Hasel. If you don't, well . . . Bianca might get mad . . . at me.
I usually wind up at Bianca's with Hasel. We're constantly trying to keep Hasel running._She's not just a project, but a friend too. She's just the nicest.
Bianca can come off a bit . . . harsh sometimes. Just know it isn't you per say, but rather she's so smart she doesn't remember how to talk to other humans.
White Ash has been my home since forever. I dig its vibe._Some people want to run away from their hometown, but I like where I live.
When Bianca and I get together sometime, you should come along too._We can dig into the depths of technobabble.
You ever want to hear a story, go talk to Bowie. Man, but be careful, he doesn't know when to stop talking._It might seem rude, but just walking away is sometimes the only option. Just an FYI.
Can I tell you something, (playername)?  You've been a solid friend to me.
You have been too Aloys.
Next time, I have to go.
Hehe. I try I guess. Let's take a boat out into the sea sometime, yeah?
Eh, I get it. Talk to ya later.
Tinkering away at home with my gear brings me joy. I hope I get to make things here in White Ash Harbor and never leave.
University was always beyond my means, but at least I got online videos to teach me._Solder Express' channel has taught me so much that I consider him my professor.
I just don't want to be a fisherman my whole life. Running my own boat will make me more money, but it isn't what I want to do forever.
I want to make something that makes life better. Not just for me, but for everyone._It's dreaming, but I'm not going to sleep through this life that's for sure.
Finding the time to get through some of the thoughts in my head is hard. It's why I carry a small notebook._Jot it down, put it away. There, I got it out, and I feel good about it.
Hey, (playername), I wanted to tell you something for a while now . . . but I don't know how to say it.
Aloys, whatever it is I'm sure we can talk about it.
That sounds serious. Everything ok?
Okay, here goes, your drip, it's basic, IMO. There, I said it. It comes from a place of love, so don't be too down on yourself.
I am into fashion. How I and others dress is important to me. So, know when I say 'Your drip is basic' just know it's coming from a place of love.
I'd recommend checking out what Milo has in stock in his shop. He has some wild one-of-a-kind items available in there.

Lots of tourists just ask me questions about where 'I fish in my off time?'_It doesn't occur to these people that humans are allowed to be 3 dimensional, ya know? It would break their brains to know I read fashion magazines.

It's a shame that we live in a time with so many threads to choose from but most folks don't care._Do yourself a favor, (playername), don't do a hoodie and sweats all the time, okay? You're better than that.
We've known each other for a while now, so if you don't want to be alone, you can always call me._No one should ever feel like they're alone. No one.
Whenever I see you, I feel like the future is a bit brighter.
That's sweet of you to say.
I see a sunrise that will never set.
It's the truth.
Hey, I was trying to romance you more! Haha! I love it.
You know how you have someone special? When you're talking or being quiet, you're doing it together, and it's never a bother.
If anything, we should really get some matching threads sometime. Yeah, I'm that kind of nerd when I love someone.
It's been a day, but you know what helps make it better? Knowing that I'll be able to hold your hand.
I just feel so alive right now, you know? The fact that you chose to be with me, just makes me feel like I can do anything.
I love you more than I have ever loved anyone. Sorry for spilling that out with no lead up, but it's what sits in my heart day in and out.
102_ALOYS_Random Interact
Hello. New to town?
What can I do you for?
Looking to become a fisherman?
Sup.
Got any hats? I like hats.
102_ALOYS_PROGRESSION
Grats, (playername). Must feel good getting that done. Le Sequoia's grand opening that is.
I heard that some dude named Lucius did a write up on your place._I didn't read it, too busy, but I'm sure the guy sucks. Don't worry about his words.
Hey, I didn't know you were helping with the bathhouse._That's pretty damn cool. I'd love to check out those steam machines. Old timey tech is so tactile!
Been hearing a lot about Le Sequoia here on the docks._Tourists seem to be showing up more and more too. Guess that's your doing, huh? Grats, man.
I'm gonna go to the tea house after work sometime. I heard you did an amazing job with it. Not gonna lie, enjoying an afternoon tea sounds super relaxing.
Yo, I've been seeing you running around here. Getting these small asks done for folks. You're a solid person for doing all that.
Hey, keep it up with all that do-gooding you've been doing.
I heard your menu is pretty epic with a great seafood selection. I'll have to check it out.
Man, that menu is wild. I am so glad you are committing to seafood.
I heard about your menu . . . I think I'm good.
I'm going to pass on the menu right now, it isn't really my bag.
Keeping the waters clean keeps my paycheck safe. Thanks for making that happen.
You are always making sure what you're doing isn't messing with the rest of us, I appreciate it._
Hey, others see how you do things, so try not trashing our waters, k?
Your actions speak for you, (playername). Trash sucks, and right now, so do you.
Now that I have my BMD, I can harvest all the raw materials I need for making . . . anything! Thanks again for the fish, (playername).
My quota isn't going up, which is good. Gotta keep that work/life balance happen. Be good at the job, but not so good I get more work. You dig?
I took the BMD out for a trial run, it's sooo good! LET'S GOOOOOO!
Going to uni was something I thought would never happen. It's crazy that it even is happening! Thanks.
I dunno what to bring clothing wise to uni. I'm so used to wearing these grubby garments all the time. I'll have to hit a few thrifts before going. Update my look.
This is it, I'm heading out for uni. (playername), I've said it a lot, but thanks for helping me out on this.
102_ALOYS_INTERACT
Even after being on my feet for 13 hours, I still get compliments. Thanks.
These threads aren't even my best. Come out on a Saturday night and you'll see my best.
I am a student, forever a student.
Mhmmm.
Umm, cool.
Sure.
Nope.
Aces, man.
This hat man, it's great. I might wear this.
Top notch! Thanks (playername).
This looks like it costs a pretty penny. Not really for me, but I will keep it.
Hey! This is a sick gift. You made my day better, and it's already a great day!
Yeah, I'm good without it.
Nah, but thanks man.
You got anything else? No? Ok. I will hold onto it.
Thanks, but you've already given me something today.
You can let go now.
Sorry, I'm a bit busy today.
Sells fishing supplies
Yo, watcha need?
We have some great fishing rods.
Be careful out there. The ocean is wild and unpredictable.
Ah. Are you a fellow angler too?
You won't be disappointed.
This one is great.
I use that one every day.
Solid pick.
I can take it from here.
Not bad. Not bad.
Sure, I can use this.
I'm good, thanks though.
No thanks, man.
I don't need this, but someone else might.
You need more credits. This isn't a charity.
It doesn't look like you can afford this.
You'll need some more credits friend.
103_HASEL
Salutations, (playername)!_I hope you're adjusting to your new surroundings because if you don't then that will make living here hard. Okay, bye!
In White Mash Barber, I mean White Ash Harbor, there are plenty of places to go and see. Like that volcano just over there. It's something to see!
. . . Sorry, I was thinking about how jellyfish can function without a brain. How is that possible?
When I'm making a boba tea, I am always adding something new to the mix, but I avoid using humans . . . I mean, animals.
Hi! Have you ever noticed how boba teas are like solar systems with tiny tapioca planets?
I wonder if I could use the sap of trees in my drinks? No, no one is ready for that yet.
Do you believe that entropy renders any ability at immortality impossible?
I'm sorry?
Entropy will lead to the death of the universe.
Right! I was making boba.
I hope I'm around to see it! Now, about that boba drink I was making.
When I woke up in White Ash Harbor, I started reading anything I could get my hands on, and I read a lot of manuals._Why doesn't anyone read those? They're full of information!
Philosophy is super intriguing!_These thoughts about the universe, about life on this planet, and about life itself just made me think, 'What if a boba drink could fix all those questions?'
A lot of people find gloomy days to be gloomy, but I look at it as a day that will never come again!_How exciting is it to see the world, on this day, in this shade of light!
I think a lot of people I meet focus too much on their face and how it looks._Makes me appreciate my face all the more.

When I'm not at the stand I like to explore. I love finding all of the dead things in the forest. I mean, abandoned things._They're like treasures but falling apart. I kinda relate to it. You want a mango merry smoothie?
I was told that I came from Billboard City, though I have no memory of my life when I lived there._Do you have a previous life you do not recall?
Uh, no, I remember everything about my life.
There are parts of it I wish I couldn't recall.
How nice it must be to remember everything._Do you remember when you were born? I bet that was exciting!

It is not something that I would recommend._Remembering is better than not because you will always wonder if you left the stove on in previous apartment and if it's still set to the 'On' position and if it is then who is paying that energy bill?
Without Alloys and Bianca, I'd be falling apart!_They keep me running and I give them free boba drinks in return.
Friends are great to have, I count you among them now._I know I'm friendly, but friendship isn't something I hand out to anyone. You have joined an exclusive club, (playername).
I hope I never forget my friends. I don't get sad, it's literally impossible for me to be sad, but that would make me sad.
Friends make life better. When Bianca, Alloys, and Milo are tinkering with my brain it's a blast!
Milo has an fun little shop down by the water. If you want some poorly made, I mean, well made clothing pieces, get some from him.
Do you have family, (playername)?
Yeah, I do.
No, I don't.
That's nice, but the latest version of Talking While Walking, a walking sim, just completely cut the endurance bar from it! Can you believe that?!
You are a lot like me then, alone, which is why I always make sure I rinse my fruit before blending it.
I've been acting funny all morning. I need to diagnose what is happening because without tomatoes would we have gone to the moon?
This isn't one of my random bugs or me getting distracted._I had a massive shift in my logistical line of thinking. I became a fish.
There isn't any water in the well! I'll use my blender to dig a hole and find the lost city!
My family are my friends and my friends are made of marshmallow.
WHERE DO BOBA'S EVEN COME FROM?! WHO MAKES THEM?!!_You're an honest individual, TELL ME YOUR SECRETS! WHERE ARE THE BOBA QUEENS???
May I tell you about the train that runs from Billboard City to here?
I'm sorry, what?
I have always wondered about it.

I'll take that as a yes. You see, it's a J series from Isky Lines, one of the most dependable trains in the world._Not only is it stylish, but it's service life will last for millions of miles. So cool!

Wonder no more! The J series from Isky Lines is one of the most stylish and dependable trains in the world!_It is over engineered, contrary to the direction most of the industry has gone, which means will run for millions of miles!

Salutations! You must be (playername), the new chef! I am Hasel; I run the Bubble Shack in White . . . whi . . . btzzzzt . . . _I mean, White Ash Harbor. I hope you enjoyed your train ride. It's a very scenic route.
Now that you are here, I can help you settle into this little hamlet by the sea._Chef Casteau asked me to show you his old restaurant. I hop . . . hop . . . h btzzzzt . . .
Hey, are you ok?
You don't look like the other androids I've seen.

. . . Ahem. It's all good! That happens a lot, my chip was damaged by all the water in the dumpster where I was found._Did I tell you I was found in a dumpster? I can't remember anything from before then. That was five years ago . . .

. . . Ahem. Ah, sorry about that. My chip can get a little buggy nowadays . . . You see, I'm an older model, pre - 2048, before the synthetic skin overhauls and the P1 processor upgrades._But no matter, what I lack in brawn, I make up for in grit!
You must be curious about the restaurant that Chef Casteau left to you. It's called Le Sequoia, named after a wonderful tree.
I know a lot about trees. Did you know the sequoia needs fire for their seeds to drop and have a chance to grow?_Without fire, the trees would never populate.
Hmmmm. Interesting . . .
Whoa! There's a frog on your head! sulfur
Ah, sorry for rambling on. As an android, I have an eternal fascination with all things living . . . _Anyhow, you must be dying to see your new restaurant. Let's get moving!
